entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early this evening then becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 in the evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
